messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Annette, And she is a really cool kid. Aimee ... From: Annette Naake  To:  Sent: Tuesday,
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Annette,
And she is a really cool kid.
Aimee

----- Original Message -----
From: Annette Naake <naake1999@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 20, 2001 6:35 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] aimee's post


> Aimee says...
>
> Can I stay if I take some and leave some?
>
> Aimee
> "who's mind is being awakened"
>
> Aimee, from your description, you sound like you have a polite,
> well-adjusted child who is learning to pitch in and entertain herself. I
> don't see anything wrong with that! Sounds like you're doing a great job!
>
> And don't imagine that just because you have those minimal expectations,
and
> they are working for you, that you can't unschool. You can!
>
> Annette
> Mom to Tony, 8, and Nicky, 4
>

messages.subject: aimee's post
messages.msgSnippet: Aimee says... Can I stay if I take some and leave some? Aimee who s mind is being awakened Aimee, from your description, you sound like you have a polite,
messages.messageBody:
Aimee says...

Can I stay if I take some and leave some?

Aimee
"who's mind is being awakened"

Aimee, from your description, you sound like you have a polite,
well-adjusted child who is learning to pitch in and entertain herself. I
don't see anything wrong with that! Sounds like you're doing a great job!

And don't imagine that just because you have those minimal expectations, and
they are working for you, that you can't unschool. You can!

Annette
Mom to Tony, 8, and Nicky, 4
